58804.<pc>は \nほこりをかぶった 古い本を見つけた。\n手に取って 読んでみます:
<pc> found an old book with
dust on it. Would you like to pick it
up and read it?<yesno><close>

33963.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「がんばって魔物:
Even if you do your best to defeat monsters, it's hard to save money, isn't it? The trick to earning money
is not to keep things you don't need right now, but to sell them to the stores and turn them into money. Oh,
that's right! And the Trial of Knowledge is on the second floor. Good luck .

33964.「よく来たな。ここは 知恵の社。\n 太古からの知恵が眠る 神聖な地。\n<br:
Welcome to the Wisdom Altar. This is the Wisdom Altar, a sacred place where ancient wisdom rests. And today, it is
also the place where you, the students, will have your trial of knowledge.

33965.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「がんばって魔物:
Even if you do your best to defeat monsters, it's hard to save money, isn't it? The trick to earning money
is not to keep things you don't need right now, but to sell them to the stores and make money.

33966.「ここは 知恵の社。\n 太古からの知恵が眠る 神聖な場所だ。\n<br>\n「:
This is the Wisdom Altar, a sacred place where ancient wisdom rests. It will be a while before everyone
finishes the trial of knowledge. You should return to the Garden of Learning first.

33967.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「くう～っ！ \:
Kuu~!The teacher gave me time to think, but I don't understand at all! Ugh. I wish I was as smart as
.

33968.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「知ってた？ 光:
Did you know? River of Light can be found not only here in Tsusukul Plains, but also in many other places
in the world. What is at the bottom of that shining river? Scholars from all over the world have looked into it,
but they don't know anything about it.

33969.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「けっこう けっ:
Very well, very well! . Your knowledge trial is over. You will return to the Garden of Learning in
Tsusukul Village. And report to Mr. Izuyanoi that you have completed your knowledge trial.

33970.「ここは 知恵の社。\n 太古からの知恵が眠る 神聖な場所だ。\n<br>\n「:
This is the Wisdom Altar, a sacred place where ancient wisdom rests. This year's knowledge trial is over. This
Wisdom Altar will be quiet.

33971.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ああ 不合格とは:
What a thing to be rejected!This is the trial that was given to me! Is the world really that harsh? I, who am
played by fate, am also an evil kunai.

33973.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おお <pc>:
Oh . I'm so glad you stopped by on your way to Trial of Strength. There are many paths leading
to the true fruit, and the true fruit can be found only by wandering aside. I hope you will continue to live as
you wish!

33974.「ここは 知恵の社。\n 太古からの知恵が眠る 神聖な場所だ。:
This is the Wisdom Altar, a sacred
place where ancient wisdom rests.

33976.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「<pc>なら:
You know what I mean. That dazzling light that has reached the world is definitely the one we
have been waiting for! You may wish to see the truth, but first return to Tsusukul Village. I am sure they are
all anxious for your safety.

33977.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「聞いたところに:
I heard that the ceremony of you leaving the nest was very fast and furious. There have been strange
happenings all over the world recently. Is that why Himea-sama rushed the nesting ceremony?

33978.「ここには 世界中の書物が 集められている。\n 今は 理解できなくても 時が来:
This is a collection of books from all over the world. Even if you don't understand them now, I am sure you
will be able to find them when the time comes.

33979.「ここは 知恵の社。\n 太古からの知恵が眠る 神聖な場所だ。\n<br>\n「:
This is the Wisdom Altar, a sacred place where ancient wisdom rests. South of here, there is a bridge
across the River of Light. Crossing it, you can go west to Wind Town Azlan. Along the way, you may
encounter more formidable monsters than you've ever encountered before. So be careful and go.

33980.「ここは 知恵の社。\n 太古からの知恵が眠る 神聖な場所だ。\n<br>\n「:
This is the Wisdom Altar, a sacred place where ancient wisdom rests. East of here is Tsusukul Village, a place
of ancient learning. To the south, there is a bridge to the west over the River of Light.

33981.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「来年こそは 卒業し:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I have to graduate next year. Kunai
Shina disappointed her mom who is
waiting for her back home.

47781.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「知ってた？ 光:
Did you know? River of Light can be found not only here in Tsusukul Plains, but also in many other places
in the world. What is at the bottom of that shining river? Scholars from all over the world have looked into it,
but they don't know anything about it.

33982.「来たか <pc>。\n 空をおおった あの まばゆい光は\n まさしく 勇者の:
Have you come ? That dazzling light that covered the sky is indeed the light that marks the birth
of Hero. From now on, the world will change rapidly. See it with your own eyes and learn from it. You will
surely find the way forward.

33983.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ここは エルフ:
This is the place where the wisdom of the Elves is gathered, and more and more foreigners come from far and wide
to visit. If you want to learn, pick up a book and learn. It is the happiness of books to be read by those
who seek wisdom.

33984.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「大いなる闇が:
It seems that a great darkness has been eviscerated. You did it, didn't you? Well done! But
your journey is not over. Once you cross into Lendersia, the center of the world, new adventures will begin.
Nevertheless, thank you for your efforts! For now, enjoy your brief respite and take your time.

201197.『ハタケー・ナイト・フィーバー』\nという古びた本だ。\n<br>\n農家のみん:
It's an old book called ''Hatake-Knight Fever''. I have wonderful news for all the farmers... When the kibble of the
hatake mushrooms is not going strong enough, Energy Powder is the best way to get the heart pumping. Energy
Powder is the parlour trousseau of <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>... Please live the shigeki life of hatake .

201198.……エナジーパウダーが 肥料になるようだ。\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>が:
It seems that Energy Powder can be used as fertilizer. Let's look for Energy Powder that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
drops. <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> seems to live in Forest of Eternity and Sunset Meadow.

201203.「……む？ 畑を 元気にするための\n 肥料について 知りたい……とな？\n<b:
Hmm? You want to know about fertilizers to keep your fields healthy? Hmm. I don't remember if it
was fertilizer or not, but I think there was a book on how to revitalize the fields on the bookshelf right
behind me. But I don't know why. I don't think it was a book I could recommend. If you still want to read
it, you may do so.

201204.『ハタケー・ナイト・フィーバー』\nという古びた本だ。\n<br>\n農家のみん:
It's an old book called ''Hatake-Knight Fever''. I have wonderful news for all the farmers... When the kibble of the
hatake mushrooms is not going strong enough, Energy Powder is the best way to get the heart pumping. Energy
Powder is the parlour trousseau of <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>... Please live the shigeki life of hatake .

201208.「……思いだした。あの本は どこぞの遊び人が\n 書いた本じゃった。文体こそ ふ:
I remember now. That book was written by some gadabout. The writing style was a joke, but the content itself was
true. However, the gadabout location that flourished a long time ago<> What are they doing now that we haven't seen them around much lately? Hmm? If it's Energy Powder,
<%seV_QUE_NAME0> will drop it. If it's Energy Powder, <%seV_QUE_NAME0> would be in Forest of Eternity, Sunset
Meadow, etc. I hope you find what you are looking for.

201209.「……ほう 探しものは 見つかったか。\n この社の本が 役に立ったならば よか:
...Well, did you find what you were looking for? I hope you found what you were looking for. You may come back
here again when you need knowledge. But I remember that the book on the bookshelf behind me, written by some
gadabout, was a joke in style, but the content itself was true. The gadabout location that flourished a long time
ago<> What are they doing now that we haven't seen them around lately?

10095000.<pc>は\n女神の天桜石を わたされた！<se_nots System Ite: <pc> was given the Goddess' Pink Gem!<se_nots System Item>

52886.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「わらわは レベ:
I'm looking for a skilled adventurer who has reached level 50, but, well, let's see, he's hard to find. Hohoho.
When you reach level 50 in any of your vocations, you may come here if you wish to reach even greater heights.

53852.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ホホホ。わらわ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hohoho. It's too early for you to undergo the ritual
of the straw. After you complete the ritual of Light
Guide Hougai, come back to the straw again.

52894.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「わらわの名は:
My name's Benihina. Ya're level 50, , ain'tcha. I heard 'bout ya from Holy Messenger Hougai.
Now, as ya may've guessed, the role of Holy Messengers in the service of the Six Saints is to uplift skilled adventurers to even greater heights.
Now then, let's perform the ritual in front of the River of Light. Hold this. This is a precious jewel called the Goddess' Pink Gem.

52896.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「そちにも 女:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Didja hear the voice of the Goddess? The ritual's now
complete.

52897.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「……さて そ: <attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>...Say, I'll letcha in on a little secret.<bw_break>

52898.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「女神の六聖陣:
As for the Goddess' Six Saints, they're literally a group who swear allegiance to and serve the Goddess.
One of the Six Saints, called War Mother, is the one I serve. Ya remember the Holy Messengers Chamim and Hougai, don'tcha.
We, by order of War Mother, perform the mysterious rituals. That's all I can tell ya for now. Next, in Orphea, ya'd best visit Holy Messenger Seiken.

52905.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「次に そちを待:
The next Light Guide that awaits you is named Seiken. He's in the Town of Orphea of Orphea Region, Pukuland.
It would be good to devote yourself to further your training, don't you agree.

52906.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「セーケンとは:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Already met with Seike, have you. Hohoho. You're
doing well with finishing your rituals. I'm rooting
for you.
